Description: LTD MH-330FR The ESP LTD MH-330FR Electric Guitar is a working musicians guitar with pro features. A super comfortable and fast thin-U maple neck with 24 XJ frets on a rosewood fingerboard complement the warm tone of the mahogany body by adding bite. Floyd Rose Special bridge offers smooth and stable tremolo dives and ESP ALH-200 active pickups pump out searing hot tone. This model is a super clean N.O.S. (new-old-stock) model that looks even better than the pictures because of it's finish that looks either blue or purple, depending on what angle it's viewed from. ESP LTD MH330FR Electric Guitar SpecificationsConstruction: Bolt-On Scale: 25.5 in. Body: Mahogany Neck: Maple Fingerboard: Rosewood Nut: 42mm Neck Contour: Thin U Frets: 24 XJ Hardware: Black Nickel Tuners: ESP Bridge and Tailpiece: Floyd Rose Special Pickups: ESP ALH-200 Controls: 3-Way Switch Master Volume Master ToneReturns & Replacements GuitarBassPro.com Amp-Shop (BassExchange.com) has a 2-week money back return policy (less shipping costs).
